skills.name: Burning Punch
skills.description: [SP: 25][CD: 10s] Unleash a humongous uppercut with mecha power. Deals 50% ATK of Physical DMG multiple times and ignites enemies in the AOE, dealing 151 Fire DMG every 0.5s for 2.08s.

skills.name: Fury Dominator
skills.description: Hits against enemies gain 25 Fire DMG.
